charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1101_0100_20:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] found Liza
hanging out on the beach.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1101_0200_20:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] walked over to chat, but Liza looked
a little sad.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_0800_10: I guess you can tell I’m feeling lonely.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_0900_10:
I’ve just gotten so used to being around Tate
all the time.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_0402_1300_10:
Yes, we’re twins. Tate and I look just like
each other.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_1400_10:
Tate said he wanted to try training separately
while we’re on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_1500_10:
There are some really tough Trainers and sync 
pairs who are totally in sync with each other.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_1600_10:
Maybe we shouldn’t be together just because
we’re twins.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_1700_10:
Maybe we needed to split up to find out why
we need each other. That was his idea.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_0401_1900_10:
Tate and I promised each other we’d meet again
after we’d gotten stronger.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_0302_2000_10: So that’s why you’re feeling lonely.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_0402_2100_10:
Tate and I promised each other we’d meet again
after we’d gotten stronger.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_2200_10:
But being by myself is making me lonelier than
I thought it would.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_2700_10: I guess I’m not really alone after all!
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_2900_10:
Whenever I’m feeling down, Lunatone’s always
there by my side to help me out.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_3000_10: Even when we first met, it was that way.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_0401_3200_10:
A long time ago, I was playing by myself
and got lost.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_0402_3400_10:
A long time ago, I was playing by myself
and got lost.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_3500_10:
It was almost nighttime, and it was getting
darker and darker. I was scared, and that’s
when Lunatone appeared.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_3600_10: It kindly guided me along the dark path.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_3700_10: That’s how Lunatone and I met.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_3900_10:
Having Lunatone around makes me feel
so much happier!
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_4000_10:
Two is more fun than one, so that’s why
we’re together.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_4100_10: Is that a good enough reason to team up?
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_0302_4400_10: Of course. And I’m here for you, too.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_4600_10:
I’ve been feeling lonely ever since Tate and I
split up, but maybe it’s not all bad.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_4700_10:
If Tate and I were still together, 
I might not have been able to grow 
so close to you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_4800_10:
It’s a chance for me to practice my teamwork
with Trainers other than Tate, too.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_4900_10:
I have to surprise Tate when I show him how
much stronger I’ve gotten.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_0401_5100_10: “The sun and the moon can’t rise together.”
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_0402_5300_10: “The sun and the moon can’t rise together.”
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_5400_10:
That’s what Tate said when he told me he
wanted to split up.
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_5500_10:
I believe the day will come when we can be
together again!
charaepi_ch0030_00_ran/2301_1201_5600_10:
Now is the time for me to grow! Thanks for
reminding me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
